name: StoriesBlog
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stories blog
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Android app developed by two enthusiastic developers
Available on Amazon Store and Google Play Store
Micro-blogging platform allowing users to write anonymous posts about their real life experiences, feelings and motivational thoughts
Users can also post their queries on it, asking for suggestions, solutions
Anonymity helps users to express their feelings honestly
Launched a year ago and it has crossed 15k downloads
We receive daily hundreds of posts and comments, thousands of views.


List of supported utterances:

open stories blog
help
read next story
read comments of this story
read statistics of this story
how many listens
write comment for this story
like this story
read statistics of this story
how many likes for this story
stop
